description.oldValue:
Shared device mode for iOS is an Azure Active Directory (AAD) capability supported by apps that allows you to initiate a global app sign in/ sign-out by any supported applications.
GA date: December CY2022
description.newValue: Shared device mode for iOS is an Azure Active Directory (AAD) capability supported by apps that allows you to initiate a global app sign in/ sign-out by any supported applications.
